Class LobbiesControllerFX

public class LobbiesControllerFX extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller responsible for the Lobby screen

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialization method called by JavaFX
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • setClient

      public void setClient(Client client)
      Link this controller to the client that is using it.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that is using this controller

    • createLobbies

      public void createLobbies(List<GameController.GameDefinition> lobbies)
      This method is responsible for the creation of the Lobby screen. In particular, it instantiates different LobbyControllerFX objects, one for each lobby, which will handle separately the display of the information of each lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbies - The list of lobbies to be displayed, in the form of GameController.GameDefinition objects

    • updateLobbies

      public void updateLobbies(List<GameController.GameDefinition> lobbies)
      This method is called to update the view showing the available games.
      Parameters:
      lobbies - The list of lobbies to be displayed, in the form of GameController.GameDefinition objects

    • HandleLobbyMessage

      public void HandleLobbyMessage(Pair<Boolean,List<GameController.GameDefinition>> response)

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      This method is called whenever the user clicks on the "Refresh" button. It calls the notify method to request the updated list of available games.

    • createGame

      public void createGame()
      This method is called whenever the user clicks on the "Create Game" button. It validates the parameters inserted by the user and, if they are correct, it calls the notify method.

    • validateString

      private boolean validateString(String input)
      This method validates a string, checking that it contains only alphanumeric characters.
      Parameters:
      input - The string to be validated
      Returns:
      True if the string is valid, false otherwise
